name: Tony Stark
primary_power: Genius-level intellect, powered armor suit (flight, repulsor blasts, super strength)

name: Steve Rogers
primary_power: Peak human physical condition (super soldier serum), master tactician, vibranium shield

name: Thor Odinson
primary_power: Asgardian physiology (super strength, durability, longevity), control over lightning and storms, Mjolnir (enchanted hammer)

name: Bruce Banner
primary_power: Gamma radiation-induced super strength, durability, healing factor (increases with rage)

name: Natasha Romanoff
primary_power: Master spy, expert martial artist, skilled in espionage and infiltration

name: Clint Barton
primary_power: Master archer, exceptional marksman, highly trained in various weaponry

name: Wanda Maximoff
primary_power: Reality warping, chaos magic, telekinesis, mental manipulation

name: Vision
primary_power: Density manipulation (intangibility, super density), flight, energy blasts (from Mind Stone)

name: Loki Laufeyson
primary_power: Asgardian physiology, magic (illusions, shapeshifting, telekinesis), master manipulator

name: Thanos
primary_power: Super strength, durability, cosmic energy manipulation (especially with Infinity Stones)

name: Ultron
origin_location: Stark Industries (created by Tony Stark/Bruce Banner)
primary_power: Artificial intelligence, super strength, flight, energy blasts, vibranium body

name: Red Skull
primary_power: Superhuman strength, tactical genius, often wields powerful artifacts (e.g., Tesseract)
